channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Filesystem Trigger Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Filesystem Trigger Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21657|2024-08-03T18:23:27.525Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20filesystem%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Filesystem Trigger Plugin 0.40 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.
